committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating November 11 of each year as Armistice Day.

summary.text: Designates November 11 of each year as "Armistice Day", and authorizes the President to annually issue a proclamation to observe such day in commemoration of the cessation of hostilities in Europe at the end of World War I.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating November 11 of each year as Armistice Day.
